com.scriptrts.game
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  com.scriptrts.game.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimatedSprite
public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object

Sprite, used by units to draw themselves on the game map

Constructor Detail

Sprite

public Sprite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
              double defaultScale,
              int backX,
              int backY)
Create a new sprite.

Parameters:
img - image used to draw the sprite
defaultScale - how much to scale the sprite by default
backX - the back location on the sprite (x coordinate)
backY - the back location on the sprite (y coordinate)
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                 GameObject unit,
                 int tileBackX,
                 int tileBackY)
Draw the sprite image on the screen.

Parameters:
graphics - graphics handle used to draw to the screen
unit - the unit which this sprite is being drawn for
tileBackX - the back corner x coordinate of the unit tile on which this is being drawn
tileBackY - the back corner y coordinate of the unit tile on which this is being drawn

drawCentered

public void drawCentered(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                         int x,
                         int y)
Draw the sprite image centered at the given point.

Parameters:
graphics - graphics handle used to draw to the screen
x - x coordinate on the screen to draw at
y - y coordinate on the screen to draw at

scale

public void scale(double scaleFactor)
Scale this sprite relative to its normal scale

Parameters:
scaleFactor - the factor by which to scale it

setImage

Set the image for this sprite to display itself as

Parameters:
image - image used to draw the sprite

                               int y)
Set the back coordinates of this image

Parameters:
